## utils.colour namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [blend(colour1, colour2, factor)](./blockly.utils.colour.blend.md) | Blend two colours together, using the specified factor to indicate the weight given to the first colour. |
|  [hexToRgb(colour)](./blockly.utils.colour.hextorgb.md) | Converts a colour to RGB. |
|  [hsvToHex(h, s, v)](./blockly.utils.colour.hsvtohex.md) | Converts an HSV triplet to hex representation. |
|  [hueToHex(hue)](./blockly.utils.colour.huetohex.md) | Convert a hue (HSV model) into an RGB hex triplet. |
|  [parse(str)](./blockly.utils.colour.parse.md) | Parses a colour from a string. .parse('red') = '\#ff0000' .parse('\#f00') = '\#ff0000' .parse('\#ff0000') = '\#ff0000' .parse('0xff0000') = '\#ff0000' .parse('rgb(255, 0, 0)') = '\#ff0000' |
|  [rgbToHex(r, g, b)](./blockly.utils.colour.rgbtohex.md) | Converts a colour from RGB to hex representation. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [names](./blockly.utils.colour.names.md) | A map that contains the 16 basic colour keywords as defined by W3C: https://www.w3.org/TR/2018/REC-css-color-3-20180619/\#html4 The keys of this map are the lowercase "readable" names of the colours, while the values are the "hex" values. |
